short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Build a Cash Buyer List Fast and Easy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The growth and success of any wholesaler is tied directly to the quality of their cash buyer’s list. With the Buyer’s List Builder, you can supercharge your list with just a few clicks.

Just download and install the Google Chrome extension.

Sign in. And create a new list. You can create as many lists as you like. In this case, we’ll create a cash buyers list.

Then go to Facebook and join real estate investor groups. Nationwide, local, a mix of both, it’s up to you. Just look for quality, active groups with lots of members.

Then search for posts that attract cash buyers. And you’ll notice the "Add To List" button. Click those, and the Buyer’s List Builder will comb through the post and scrape for phone numbers and emails, adding them to your list while avoiding duplicates. 

Repeat as much as you like, saving you hours and hours of time and building out your list in record time. Export with just a click and get a neatly organized .csv file making it easy to start sending out your deals.

Get serious about building your cash buyer’s list today!
